tools.name: Sanitize Text
tools.description: Removes unwanted characters, formatting, and HTML from text to clean it up.

tools.name: Text Formatter
tools.description: Formats text with lowercase, uppercase, reverse, etc.

tools.name: Base 64 Encoder/Decoder
tools.description: Encodes or decodes text into or from Base64 format, commonly used in data transmission.

tools.name: Password Generator
tools.description: Generate strong, random passwords effortlessly with our Password Generator. Customize your password length and choose from various character types, including numbers, lowercase, uppercase, and symbols. Whether you want to create a secure password for your accounts or generate multiple passwords at once, our intuitive tool ensures your passwords are both complex and easy to remember. Stay protected and enhance your online security with just a few clicks!

tools.name: BCrypt Hashing
tools.description: Generates secure hashed passwords using the BCrypt hashing algorithm.

tools.name: Image to Base64 String Converter
tools.description: Converts images to Base64 encoded strings for easy embedding and transmission.

tools.name: Base64 to Image Preview Generator
tools.description: Generates a preview of an image from a Base64 encoded string, allowing you to visualize the image directly.

tools.name: URL Encoder/Decoder
tools.description: Encodes or decodes URLs for safe transmission and readability.
